mean_cn: vt.与某人对峙；与……对抗；正视
mean_en: to make somebody face or deal with an unpleasant or difficult person or situation; to have something in front of you that you have to deal with or react to
sentence: The two men confront each other with anger.
sentence_trans: 两个男人面带怒火，相互对峙。
word_etyma: con共同 + front前额 → 互相面对 → confront对抗，面临
